thread.title: The General Staff updated the data on enemy losses: 1190 soldiers, 4 tanks, 32 armored personnel carriers | УНН
thread.title_full: The General Staff updated the data on enemy losses: 1190 soldiers, 4 tanks, 32 armored personnel carriers | УНН

author: Julia Kotwicka
title: The General Staff updated the data on enemy losses: 1190 soldiers, 4 tanks, 32 armored personnel carriers | УНН
text: The General Staff updated the data on enemy losses: 1190 soldiers, 4 tanks, 32 armored personnel carriers Kyiv • UNN The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported on the losses of the invaders over the past day. Total enemy losses since the beginning of the war: 605330 personnel, 8533 tanks, 16599 armored personnel carriers and other equipment. During the last day, the forces of the terrorist country lost 1190 soldiers. This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, UNN reports. Details Combat losses of the invaders for the period from 24.02.22 to 23.08.24: - Personnel: 605330 (+1190). - Tanks: 8533 (+4). - Armored combat vehicles: 16599 (+32). - Artillery systems: 17307 (+45). - RSVP: 1167 (+1). - Air defense systems: 932 (+1). - Airplanes: 367. - Helicopters: 328. - UAVs of operational and tactical level: 14025 (+27). - Cruise missiles: 2442. - Ships/boats: 28. - Submarines: 1. - Automotive equipment and tankers: 23329 (+49). - Special equipment: 2910 (+6). Due to the constant receipt of updated intelligence data, it became necessary to adjust some of the positions of total enemy losses - cruise missiles. The total figure has been adjusted, and the losses per day are presented as usual [Генштаб: 135 боєзіткнень на фронті, основні атаки були зафіксовані на Покровському напрямкуAugust 22 2024, 11:00 PM • 20471 view](/en/news/henshtab-135-boiezitknen-na-fronti-osnovni-ataky-buly-zafiksovani-na-pokrovskomu-napriamku) All necessary services for combatants and family members of the fallen: City Veterans Center opened in Brovary (video) [Exclusive](/en/news/lawyer-sbi-investigators-in-the-case-of-nbu-chief-lawyer-zyma-can-be-held-liable-for-failure-to-comply-with-court-order) Lawyer: SBI investigators in the case of NBU Chief Lawyer Zyma can be held liable for failure to comply with court order [Exclusive](/en/news/is-there-any-punishment-for-illegal-prosecution-in-ukraine-sapo-comments-on-acquittal-of-ex-minister-omelyan) Is there any punishment for illegal prosecution in Ukraine -
